page.title: 06BIRSTALL COMMUNITY PRESS
page.content: Three publications serve Birstall: {'Bugle'}(Birstall Community College Magazine),{'Contact'}(Magazine of news and events from churches, community and college) and{'Birstall Post'. The{Birstall Post}is a free, monthly paper produced by the{Birstall {Action Team}who are supported by the {Manpower Services Commission. They receive most of their information from people contacting their office or by attending Parish Council Meetings. They came to interview us about the{Domesday {Project}and we visited the office. When information comes in, they first check it for spelling. Then the typist types out 31 characters per line and gives it to the Editor. Next they have to think of a short and interesting headline. Pictures are made into dots before they are used.
